hero.name: Yusuf KOCABIYIK
hero.title: Creative thinker Minimalism lover
hero.description: Hi, Iâ€™m Yusuf. Iâ€™m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Letâ€™s shake hands with me.

skills.description: JavaScript is the core programming language used to build interactive and dynamic web applications.In my projects, I have used JavaScript to handle user interactions, manipulate the DOM, communicate with APIs, and write clean, maintainable code using modern ES6+ features.I have hands-on experience with asynchronous programming, event handling, and basic state management concepts.

React is a powerful JavaScript library that I use to build modern and scalable user interfaces.By leveraging functional components, hooks, and a component-based architecture, I create reusable and maintainable UI structures.In my projects, I have implemented routing with React Router and managed application state using Context API or other state management approaches.

Java is a powerful, object-oriented programming language I use to build scalable and reliable backend applications. By applying OOP principles, I develop clean and maintainable code structures, implement RESTful services, and manage database integrations. With Spring Boot, I design modular and efficient backend services based on layered architecture principles.

Node.js enables server-side development using JavaScript to build fast and scalable backend applications.I have worked on creating RESTful APIs, handling database connections, and managing data flow between client and server using Node.js.I focus on building efficient and performance-oriented systems by leveraging its asynchronous, non-blocking architecture.

I actively worked with the C programming language throughout my university education and built my core programming foundation using C. I developed small-scale projects such as a library management system and a hotel reservation system. During this process, I improved my skills in algorithm development, basic data structures, and C syntax. I also strengthened my knowledge through Udemy courses to build a solid understanding of programming fundamentals.

I actively used MATLAB and Simulink throughout my university education, particularly in courses involving system dynamics, control theory, and simulation studies. I gained practical experience in modeling and control system analysis using these tools. For my graduation project, I developed the mathematical model of an active suspension system and designed its controller in the MATLAB/Simulink environment, analyzing system performance through simulations.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.aboutMe: I am a graduate of YÄ±ldÄ±z Technical University with a degree in Control and Automation Engineering. I am interested in software developing with modern technics!

projects.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible
